author: melaquias
msg: Oops.  Fix to put in missing {} or won't compile!

author: melaquias
msg: Put check in message() behavior for null return value from getString(key) call.
If string resource not there, log key parameter as the message.

author: melaquias
msg: Refactored to use org.apache.tomcat.util.res.StringManager for String Resource retrieval.   [i.e. maximize code re-use].
Jasper message strings in org.apache.jasper.resources no longer stored in "messages.properties", but rather "LocalStrings.properties" as required by StringManager.

author: melaquias
msg: Fix bug in getString() that throws nullpointerexception if args==null.

author: melaquias
msg: Name change necessary to shift Jasper over to using org.apache.tomcat.util.res.StringManager for String resource access.
